item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tianjin Robot Incident Raises Alarm over Public Safety and Robotics (54 points | 25 comments)
2. Hacking the Xbox 360 Hypervisor Part 2: The Bad Update Exploit (112 points | 36 comments)
3. The power of interning: making a time series database smaller (177 points | 43 comments)

7. Atlanta Fed predicts -2.8% GDP (110 points | 49 comments)
8. One Logo, Three Companies (31 points | 5 comments)

20. Go-attention: A full attention mechanism and transformer in pure Go (51 points | 22 comments)
21. First flat telescope lens that captures color, detecting light from stars (69 points | 16 comments)
22. Show HN: Firebender, a simple coding agent for Android Engineers (24 points | 4 comments)
23. AgenticMemory: Zettelkasten inspired agentic memory system (24 points | 4 comments)
24. Cautious Optimizers: Improving Training with One Line of Code (26 points | 1 comment)
25. James Harrison, whose blood donations saved >2M babies, has died (90 points | 29 comments)
26. PFAS in fertilisers blamed for killing livestock in Texas and wreaking havoc (36 points | 5 comments)

28. MIT 6.S184: Introduction to Flow Matching and Diffusion Models (310 points | 17 comments)
29. Send Data with Sound (12 points | 17 comments)
